Text:
Let us pray.
Lord Jesus Christ, You are meek and humble of heart. You make pleasant the yoke and light the burden for those who follow You. [t] Worthy are You to receive our prayers and our devotion. [*] Grant us Your peace so that we might arise ready to serve You; You who live and reign forever.
Amen.
Changes: 2024-01-11 - Constance McIntosh Smith: Implemented her editorial feedback.
